name: Park Tool AWS-11 Folding Hex Wrench
description: A convenient fold-up tool that includes all the popular hex wrench sizes. The comfortable composite handle makes it slip-resistant tool and gives you the right angle for the job at hand.Composite handle is 40% stronger than steel.Tools are hardened,  tempered steel.3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 6mm, 8mm, and 10mm hex wrenches are included.Chamfered tips ensures perfect fit.
